          <title>
            <string language="sl">Polje v okolici pospešenega naboja: sevanje</string>
            <string language="en">The field of an accelerated charge: Radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auffangene einer beschleunigten Ladung: 
Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La zone d'une charge accélérée : 
Rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O campo de uma carga acelerada: Radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il campo di una carica accelerata: 
Radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πεδίο μιας επιταχυνόμενης δαπάνης: 
Ακτινοβολία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El campo de una carga acelerada: 
Radiación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv pospeška in pojemka električnega naboja na električno polje in oblika polja pri velikih hitrostih.</string>
            <string language="en">Effect of accelerating charge on its electric field and shape of field at high speed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hitrost polja</string>
            <string language="en">field velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt der Beschleunigung der Ladung auf seinem 
elektrischen fangen auf und Form von fangen an der 
großen Geschwindigkeit auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet d'accélérer la charge sur son champ 
électrique et la forme de la zone à la grande vitesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito de acelerar a carga em seu campo elétrico
e a forma do campo na alta velocidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto di accelerazione carica sul relativo 
campo elettrico e della figura del campo all'alta velocità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση της επιτάχυνσης της δαπάνης στο ηλεκτρικό 
πεδίο του και της μορφής του πεδίου με την υψηλή ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto de acelerar la carga en su campo 
eléctrico y la dimensión de una variable del campo en la velocidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Geschwindigkeit auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
